languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, ваши ресурсы и статус позволят вам обойтись самым банальным и доступным инструментом из всех, какие можно применить в этой ситуации. Наймиты. Псы войны, готовые за монету отправиться хоть в сам варп. Обеспечьте надзирателей подобной подмогой — и кризис будет преодолен".

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, ваши ресурсы и статус позволят вам обойтись самым банальным и доступным инструментом из всех, какие можно применить в этой ситуации. Наймиты. Псы войны, готовые за монету отправиться хоть в сам варп. Обеспечьте надзирателей подобной подмогой — и кризис будет преодолен".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to use the most banal and affordable tool of all that can be used in this situation — to hire the mercenaries. The War Dogs who would be ready and willing to go even inside the Warp if you pay them well. Provide the wardens with the support like this, and the crisis shall be overcome."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to use the most banal and affordable tool of all that can be used in this situation — to hire the mercenaries. The War Dogs who would be ready and willing to go even inside the Warp if you pay them well. Provide the wardens with the support like this, and the crisis shall be overcome."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the wardens with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the overseers with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

languages.text: “舰长大人，您身居高位，拥有足够的资源，可以使用最笨拙、最便宜的工具——雇佣兵。只要您付给他们足够的报酬，这群战争贩子甚至连亚空间都愿意闯。让他们为监察员提供支援，这场危机很快就会结束。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the overseers with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您身居高位，拥有足够的资源，可以使用最笨拙、最便宜的工具——雇佣兵。只要您付给他们足够的报酬，这群战争贩子甚至连亚空间都愿意闯。让他们为监察员提供支援，这场危机很快就会结束。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, sus recursos y su estatus le permiten hacer uso de una de las herramientas más contundentes y asequibles de todas: los mercenarios. Estos perros de guerra estarían incluso dispuestos a entrar en la disformidad si se les pagara lo suficiente. Proporciona a los guardias algunos refuerzos en sus filas, y la crisis habrá terminado en cuestión de minutos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the wardens with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, sus recursos y su estatus le permiten hacer uso de una de las herramientas más contundentes y asequibles de todas: los mercenarios. Estos perros de guerra estarían incluso dispuestos a entrar en la disformidad si se les pagara lo suficiente. Proporciona a los guardias algunos refuerzos en sus filas, y la crisis habrá terminado en cuestión de minutos».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたのように資源と地位があれば...傭兵という最も率直で手頃な価格のツールを利用することができますね。これらの戦争犬たちは、十分な報酬を払えば、<歪み>の中に入る準備もできているし、喜んで入ってくれるでしょう。看守たちを援助すれば、危機はすぐに収まると思います」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the wardens with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたのように資源と地位があれば...傭兵という最も率直で手頃な価格のツールを利用することができますね。これらの戦争犬たちは、十分な報酬を払えば、<歪み>の中に入る準備もできているし、喜んで入ってくれるでしょう。看守たちを援助すれば、危機はすぐに収まると思います」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, votre statut et vos ressources vous permettent d'avoir recours au moyen le plus brutal et le plus économique qui soit : des mercenaires. Ce sont des types prêts à tout, même à plonger au cœur du Warp si vous les payez suffisamment. Engagez-en pour servir de renforts aux gardiens, et cette crise ne sera bientôt plus qu'un mauvais souvenir. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the wardens with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, votre statut et vos ressources vous permettent d'avoir recours au moyen le plus brutal et le plus économique qui soit : des mercenaires. Ce sont des types prêts à tout, même à plonger au cœur du Warp si vous les payez suffisamment. Engagez-en pour servir de renforts aux gardiens, et cette crise ne sera bientôt plus qu'un mauvais souvenir. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Eure Ressourcen und Euer Status gestatten es Euch, eines der stumpfesten und günstigsten Werkzeuge überhaupt zu wählen — Söldner. Diese Hunde des Krieges wären sogar bereit, in den Warp zu ziehen, wenn Ihr sie nur gut genug bezahlt. Bietet den Wärtern ein wenig Unterstützung aus ihren Reihen, dann ist die Krise in wenigen Augenblicken vorbei."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the wardens with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Eure Ressourcen und Euer Status gestatten es Euch, eines der stumpfesten und günstigsten Werkzeuge überhaupt zu wählen — Söldner. Diese Hunde des Krieges wären sogar bereit, in den Warp zu ziehen, wenn Ihr sie nur gut genug bezahlt. Bietet den Wärtern ein wenig Unterstützung aus ihren Reihen, dann ist die Krise in wenigen Augenblicken vorbei."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, kaynaklarınız ve statünüz gereği en gabi ve ucuz araçlardan birine erişiminiz bulunuyor: Paralı askerlere. Bu harp köpeklerinin cebine güzelce para akıtabilirseniz öteboyutu bile darmadağın edeceklerdir. Gözetmenlere destek olmalarını sağlayabilirseniz bu krizi çözülmüş bilebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, kaynaklarınız ve statünüz gereği en gabi ve ucuz araçlardan birine erişiminiz bulunuyor: Paralı askerlere.
